plot: In a small town of Tokyo there lives a middle-aged man, Suzuki, who spends normal days conducting a small business. One day he happens to discover a mysterious entrance that leads to an alien space. Through it he reaches a world of goblins and attaches control devices to goblins there to make them obey his command.
opening_theme: "Seigi no Shisha Daze Doteraman" (正義の使者だぜドテラマン) by Koorogi'73
ending_theme: "Motto Boogie Woogie" (もっとブ鬼゛ウ鬼゛) by Koorogi'73 & Noriko Tsukase
